    Try Before You Buy

    Hiring a motorhome is the smartest first step

    Hire Before You Buy

    Why renting a motorhome first can save you money, stress, and regret.

    üöê Why Hiring First Makes Sense

    Buying a motorhome is a big investment ‚Äî and it‚Äôs easy to get it wrong. Hiring lets you test different layouts, sizes, and features in the real world before you commit. You‚Äôll quickly learn what matters most to you (and what doesn‚Äôt).

    üß™ What You‚Äôll Learn by Hiring

    • Driving comfort ‚Äì Are you happy behind the wheel of a 7.5m coachbuilt, or do you prefer a compact van?
    • Layout preferences ‚Äì Fixed bed vs. make-up bed? Rear lounge or front dinette?
    • Storage needs ‚Äì Do you need a garage for bikes, or are overhead lockers enough?
    • Power setup ‚Äì Are you okay with hook-ups only, or do you need solar and leisure batteries?
    • Daily routines ‚Äì How do you cook, wash, sleep, and relax in the space?

    üèïÔ∏è UK Motorhome Hire Companies

    Here are a few popular options to get you started:

    • Just Go ‚Äì Large fleet, nationwide pickup, good for first-timers
    • Bunk Campers ‚Äì UK and Ireland, compact and family-friendly options
    • Spaceships Rentals ‚Äì Budget-friendly campervans and motorhomes
    • Camplify ‚Äì Peer-to-peer rentals (like Airbnb for motorhomes)
    • Go Boony ‚Äì Another peer-to-peer platform with great variety

    üí° Tip: Hire in the off-season (spring or autumn) for better rates and quieter roads.

    üìù What to Look For When Hiring

    • Mileage limits ‚Äì Some rentals cap your daily distance
    • Insurance excess ‚Äì Check what‚Äôs covered and what‚Äôs not
    • Breakdown cover ‚Äì Essential peace of mind
    • What‚Äôs included ‚Äì Bedding, kitchen kit, levelling ramps?
    • Pick-up location ‚Äì Can you get there easily?

    üß≠ After the Hire

    • Make notes: What did you love? What annoyed you?
    • Take photos of clever storage or layout ideas
    • Update your ‚Äúmust-have‚Äù and ‚Äúnever again‚Äù lists
    • Use your experience to guide your purchase ‚Äî or decide to keep hiring!
